content:
For those who aren't watching in other communication media:

please freeze all committing to the BRL-CAD subversion repository on sourceforge
we're seeing some strange behavior (HEAD version older than latest commits) and there is a potential for corruption

and now it's fixed. something happened on the Sourceforge side of things, so we had to replay a few commits. everything should be back to normal now. if you had a checkout already updated past commit 70872, you might want to get a fresh checkout.

or not, and you just might get an md5 error if you try to commit to one of those four files (or maybe svn automagically fixes itself -- don't know). either way, we're back to a good state, good to commit again.
